alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 11:54PM MST until January 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM FRIDAY TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Wet Mountains, Pueblo County below 6300 feet and Crowley County. * WHEN...From 2 PM Friday to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
